headline: Chipotle launches free offer for customers amid struggles
summary: Chipotle recently saw a drop in consumer demand, mirroring a broader slowdown across the fast-food industry. To help combat this shift, it is giving away $1 million worth of freebies for a limited time to win over customers. In Chipotle’s fourth-quarter earnings report for 2025, it revealed ...

headline: Chipotle CEO Says Higher-Income Customers Give Company 'Confidence' To Keep Raising Prices: Report
summary: Scott Boatwright said the company plans to continue raising prices, citing that 60% of its core customers earn over $100,000 annually.
